title: Billy Batson and the Magic of Shazam!
description:
Billy Batson and the Power of Shazam! was conceived by and illustrated by animator Mike Kunkel (Hero Bear). He wrote and drew the first four issues of the ongoing series. These are the only ones in this torrent, as the rest of the series never matched the quality of Kunkel's initial work.

As concepted by an animation professional, one can derive from this all ages book what a Captain Marvel animated series could have been like.
